title: Button Finance Appoints Amanda Niswonger as Senior Account Manager; Continues Expansion of Mortgage Broker Relationships - Yahoo Finance
content: Button Finance Appoints Amanda Niswonger as Senior Account Manager; Continues Expansion of Mortgage Broker Relationships  Yahoo Finance
description: NEW YORK, February 03, 2022--Amanda Niswonger an award winning leader with 15 years of sales experience in the mortgage industry, joins Button Finance as Senior Account Manager.
